thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com
thread.title: Timothy S.

author: Timothy S.
title: Timothy S.
text: The customer service agent I signed up with was very nice and helpful. I got an installation appointment for the very next day, and the time frame I was given was very accurate. The installer was actually a few minutes early! He was very friendly as well. And I know what my monthly bill will be, barring a tax increase or any addition from us. And so far, no service interruptions from weather, etc. No complaints!
